climatePledgeFriendly.details: EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

features: One 11 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Natural Clarifying Lemon Shampoo
Gently cleanses and revitalizes hair while removing excess oils and dulling build up
Certified organic formula made with plant-based botanicals and essential oils
No GMOs, parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Made with plant-sourced botanicals and essential oils, this certified organic formula gently cleanses and revitalizes hair while removing excess oils and dulling build up. A carefully balanced blend of lemon essential oil, quinoa protein, aloe and vitamin E work in harmony to gently condition and seal the hair cuticle, leaving it looking smooth and bright. This EWG VERIFIED shampoo is made with non-GMO ingredients and no parabens, harsh preservatives, synthetic colors or fragrances, or phthalates. It is also vegan and not tested on animals. Includes one 11 oz. bottle of Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Deep Rooted Beauty Curated from nature’s pure resources, Avalon Organics NSF organic certified skin care, hair care and bath & body products are deep-rooted in a profound respect for the earth. Combining modern science with the botanical world, we constantly strive to perfect each formula, evolve expertise and deliver innovation. Searching out the beautifying benefits hidden within each plant, Avalon Organics thoughtfully develops formulas to not only nourish the body, but also nourish the mind and the soul.

Driven by a dedication to organic agriculture and formula transparency, all Avalon Organics products are certified to the NSF/ANSI 305 Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients*. Through this honest, transparent process, the Avalon Organics brand creates products that are safe, effective and conscious of the greater good. *Claim approval was given on April 11, 2011 from QAI with certificate ID C01655324-NSF3HNPC-5.

Humbled by a profound respect for all living beings, Avalon Organics products are vegan and cruelty-free.* The Avalon Organics brand never tests products on animals, and will only source ingredients that the supplier can document are not tested on animals. This commitment to kindness is represented by the leaping bunny logo that appears on product labels. *Cruelty free certified by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008

Avalon Organics Rosemary Shampoo, 32 fl oz Avalon Organics Rosemary Conditioner, 32 fl. oz Avalon Organics Shampoo, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz Avalon Organics Conditioner, Clarifying Lemon, 11 Oz More Hair Care Products from Avalon Organics Formulated for thin and limp hair, this shampoo, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, thoroughly cleanses hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Formulated for thin and limp hair, this conditioner, containing a medley of Rosemary Essential Oil, Quinoa Protein, Calendula, Aloe and Vitamin E, lightly conditions hair while reinforcing volume from root to tip. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Shampoo. Restore natural highlights and shine to dull, lackluster hair with Avalon Organics Clarifying Lemon Conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent shampoo with a pleasant smell. It lathers perfectly and almost squeaky clean feel but doesn't dry out my hair either. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleanses without drying..really! LOVE this stuff and it smells great. I 'm a huge fan of Avalon products after trying so many overpriced hair products that don't live up to their hype. Great prices. Great products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great smell and cleansing. Best for oily hair
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shampoo. If you like the lemon scent, this is definitely worth getting!BUT! Delivery is just terrible. It doesn't have any extra packaging and when it's delivered, half of it spills out, so I stopped buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells SO good! Great lathering, hair looks and feels great.
reviews.reviewText: Great value. Best clarifying shampoo I have ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for oily scalp
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, I have really oily hair/scalp and I wake up every morning looking like I dumped a bottle of oil on my head overnight. Unless I put my hair up on a ponytail and a cap to go for a walk/hike I won't dare leave the house without washing my hair. I must wash my hair every single day "(I found this shampoo and use it every other day because it's kind of expensive. On the days I use it I notice my hair looks less shiny the following morning, not enough to not wash it but better. I have an evening outing I make sure to use it that day. I feel it helps control the oil a bit. It lathers nicely, has a pleasant scent and overall is a great product. If you have oily hair, this works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clarifying lemon shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Decided to try this clarifying shampoo on a whim. I love it! It works great removing the hairspray buildup, has a nice fragrance and the price is right!! I noticed on other reviews about leakage due to the cap not being on tight. I was lucky as I had a similar issue but because it was delivered in less than 24 hours there was very little spillage. Regardless, I will definitely be ordering again, thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great product - Erratic Pricing
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this shampoo for years. Love the clean ingredients. Love the scent. Love how it removes build-up from hard water. That said, the price has DOUBLED since I bought it four months ago. Very unhappy. Will be searching for another product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for my fine hair!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo! I have waist length fine hair (lots of it) and it helps keep it feeling bouncy and not weighed down, also TONS of shine! Lemon is my favorite scent, and it delivers with realistic lemon scent, not the chemical kind. The scent does not linger much afterwards. I tried neutrogena's new grapefruit clarifier, and did not like it nearly as much. I don't use products or blow dry my hair, and I only wash my hair 1-2 times per week so this works for me most of the time. When my scalp got dry in the winter I did switch to H&S dry scalp care for a bit, but couldn't wait to use this again, as nothing else feels as light or looks so shiny. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Very good shampoo but now it's so expensive!
Lo conoscevo già e continuo a riprenderlo. Pulisce davvero bene i capelli!
very nice shampoo will be ordering this again leaves your hair silky everytime

reviews.reviewTitle: De los mejores shampoos que he usado!
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó! Huele riquísimo y deja el cabello brillante. Además es totalmente natural, no contiene ingredientes dañinos, es vegano y no probado en animales. Vale lo que cuesta y sin duda lo compraré otra vez. Me alegra que Amazon venda este tipo de productos.
、約10年愛用しましたが、価格も高くなる一方どうするか、検討中です。
